items.title: USA Weather Watches and Warnings
items.snippet: A live data feed from the National Weather Service containing official weather warnings, watches, and advisory statements for the United States.

items.title: Active Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons
items.snippet: This layer describes the observed path, forecast track, and intensity of tropical cyclone activity (hurricanes, typhoons, cyclones) from the National Hurricane Center (NHC) and Joint Typhoon Warning Center (JTWC).

items.title: Current Weather and Wind Station Data
items.snippet: The Current Weather and Wind Station Data layer is created from hourly METAR station data provided from NOAA and contains approximately 11 weather variables for each location.

items.title: National Weather Service Ice Accumulation Forecast
items.snippet: Ice Accumulation forecast for the next 72 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: National Weather Service Smoke Forecast
items.snippet: Smoke forecast for the next 48 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: National Weather Service Snowfall Forecast
items.snippet: Snowfall forecast for the next 72 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: National Weather Service Wind Forecast
items.snippet: Wind forecast for the next 72 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: National Weather Service Wind Gust Forecast
items.snippet: Predicted wind gust for the next 72 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: National Weather Service Wind Speed Forecast
items.snippet: Predicted wind speed for the next 72 hours across the Continental United States.

items.title: Recent Earthquakes
items.snippet: This service presents recent earthquake information from the USGS Prompt Assessment of Global Earthquakes for Response (PAGER) program.

items.title: Recent Hurricanes, Cyclones and Typhoons
items.snippet: This layer features tropical storm (hurricanes, typhoons, cyclones) tracks, positions, and observed wind swaths from the past hurricane season for the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian Basins.

items.title: Satellite (MODIS) Thermal Hotspots and Fire Activity
items.snippet: Thermal activity detected by the MODIS sensors on the NASA Aqua and Terra satellites during the last 48 hours.

items.title: Satellite (VIIRS) Thermal Hotspots and Fire Activity
items.snippet: Thermal activity detected by the VIIRS sensors on the NOAA/NASA Suomi NPP and NOAA-20 satellites during the last 7 days.

items.title: USA Current Wildfires
items.snippet: This layer shows wildfires that have been updated within the past 7 days in the United States from IRWIN and NIFC information.

items.title: USA Short-Term Weather Warnings
items.snippet: This layer presents continuously updated weather warnings for the United States based on data from NOAA's National Weather Service.

items.title: USA Storm Reports
items.snippet: This layer contains continuously updated U.S. tornado reports, wind storm reports and hail storm reports.
